name: Car Driving Prototype
description:
Drive around a car or bus on a small test track with obstacles. Change time of day, honk your horn, use your lights, drift around, fall to your death.

Features cel shaded graphics.

This is a small project to test a future car RPG game with a focus on arcade style driving. If you give it a try please let me know what you think! Any changes or improvements I can make here will transfer over to the full game.
